footer.description: Loosely designed in my imagination and coded in <vscode>Visual Studio Code</vscode> by yours truly. Built with <nextjs>NextJS</nextjs>, <tailwind>TailwindCSS</tailwind> and <shadcn>shadcn</shadcn>, deployed with <vercel>Vercel</vercel>. All text is set in the <geist>Geist</geist> typeface.
